DOC.detailed_description: PROTOCOL OUTLINE : This randomize , double blind , placebo control , multicenter study . All patient undergo lumbar puncture receive acyclovir IV every 8 hour Days 1-14 . On Day 12 , patient may undergo lumbar puncture ( discretion investigator ) . Whole blood obtain herpes simplex virus PCR analysis . Upon completion intravenous therapy , patient negative CSF PCR randomize one two treatment arm . Arm I : Patients receive oral acyclovir three time daily 6 month . Arm II : Patients receive placebo three time daily 6 month . In case cutaneous recurrence first 12 month study , patient receive open label oral acyclovir ( CSF PCR negative ) acyclovir IV ( CSF PCR positive ) 5 day . Patients may may continue study drug follow treatment . Patients follow 6 , 12 , 24 , 36 , 48 , 60 month age .
